decimals.descr: Decimals of the asset. Recommended is 6 decimal places.

name.descr: Name of the asset. Max 32 bytes

symbol.descr: Symbol of the asset. Max 8 bytes

methods.name: arc200_name
methods.desc: Returns the name of the token

methods.name: arc200_symbol
methods.desc: Returns the symbol of the token

methods.name: arc200_decimals
methods.desc: Returns the decimals of the token

methods.name: arc200_totalSupply

returns.desc: The total supply of the token

methods.desc: Returns the total supply of the token

methods.name: arc200_balanceOf

args.name: owner
args.desc: The address of the owner of the token

returns.desc: The current balance of the holder of the token

methods.desc: Returns the current balance of the owner of the token

methods.name: arc200_transferFrom
methods.desc: Transfers tokens from source to destination as approved spender

args.name: spender
args.desc: Who is allowed to take tokens on owner's behalf

args.name: value
args.desc: Amount of tokens to be taken by spender

methods.name: arc200_allowance

args.name: spender
args.desc: Who is allowed to take tokens on owner's behalf

methods.desc: Returns the current allowance of the spender of the tokens of the owner
